name: m365-get-shared-mailboxes-without-owners
title: Get Shared Mailboxes Without Owners
shortDescription: This script identifies shared mailboxes that have no assigned owners or members by analysing mailbox permissions in Exchange Online.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Get Shared Mailboxes Without Owners

references.name: Want to learn more about Microsoft Graph PowerShell SDK and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the Microsoft Graph PowerShell SDK documentation site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
